Package ohos.ai.asr

Class AsrClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.asr.AsrClient

  • public class AsrClient
extends Object
    Provides methods for invoking the automatic speech recognition (ASR) engine service.

    For example, you use these methods to initialize the ASR engine service, start speech recognition, stop speech recognition, and recognize PCM streams.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Detail

      • createAsrClient

        public static Optional<AsrClient> createAsrClient​(Context context)
        Creates an AsrClient instance.

        The created object is used for invoking the ASR engine capability.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context. This parameter cannot be null.
        Returns:
        Returns an AsrClient object.
        Since:
        3

      • init

        public void init​(AsrIntent intent,
                 AsrListener asrListener)
        Initializes the ASR engine service.

        An ASR listener is passed to this method for observing the process and result of an ASR method call, and initialization parameters are passed for initializing the ASR engine. You must use this method and obtain the result of AsrListener#onInit(PacMap)} before calling the ASR methods such as startListening(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent) and @link #stopListening()}.

        Before re-initializing the ASR service, use destroy() to release the ASR engine.

        Parameters:
        intent - Indicates ASR initialization parameters, which are defined in AsrIntent. This parameter cannot be null. Generally, you need to set the audio source type during initialization, otherwise the default audio source type AsrIntent.AsrAudioSrcType#ASR_SRC_TYPE_FILE is used.
        asrListener - Indicates the listener to observe the process and result of ASR method calls. This parameter cannot be null.
        Since:
        3

      • startListening

        public void startListening​(AsrIntent asrIntent)
        Starts reading and recognizing speech data.

        If an audio file is detected, this method reads the file and performs speech recognition with the file path specified using AsrIntent#setFilePath(String); if PCM streams are detected, this method works with writePcm(byte[],int) to perform speech recognition.

        Before using this method, you need to call init(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent,ohos.ai.asr.AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine service.

        Parameters:
        asrIntent - Indicates ASR parameters. You can set the pre-VAD threshold, post-VAD threshold, recognition timeout threshold, and file path (only for audio files). This parameter cannot be null. Unless otherwise specified, the default parameter values are used. For details about the parameters and their default values, see AsrIntent.
        Since:
        3

      • stopListening

        public void stopListening​()
        Stops speech recognition.

        After you call this method, the obtained speech data will be recognized, and new data will not. Generally, you do not need to call this method because the ASR engine server automatically stops speech recognition upon detecting that speech recognition is complete. Alternatively, you can use this method to manually stop speech recognition at a specific moment.

        Before using this method, you need to call init(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent,ohos.ai.asr.AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine service.

        Since:
        3

      • writePcm

        public void writePcm​(byte[] bytes,
                     int length)
        Writes the PCM audio stream into a byte array and performs speech recognition.

        Before using this method, you need to call init(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent,ohos.ai.asr.AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine service and call startListening(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent) to obtain the PCM stream, which will be passed to the ASR engine. The size of the PCM stream cannot exceed 800 KB. In addition, the duration of the PCM-encoded audio to play cannot exceed 20s.

        Parameters:
        bytes - Indicates the PCM stream. This parameter cannot be null. Its length must be greater than 0, and its size must be less than or equal to 800 KB.
        length - Indicates the valid length of the PCM audio stream, either 1280 or 640 bytes.
        Since:
        3

      • cancel

        public void cancel​()
        Cancels speech recognition.

        Once speech recognition is canceled, the obtained speech data will no longer be recognized.

        Before using this method, you need to call init(ohos.ai.asr.AsrIntent,ohos.ai.asr.AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine service.

        Since:
        3

      • destroy

        public void destroy​()
        Destroys the ASR service by canceling all ongoing ASR tasks.

        The destroyed ASR service can no longer be used. To use the ASR service again, you need to call createAsrClient(ohos.app.Context) to create another AsrClient instance.

        Since:
        3
